price: (Bamuzanye) baravuga bati “Ese yewe Ibrahimu, koko ni wowe wagize utya imana zacu?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
